author: Ilze-Mari Van Zyl
text:
In today’s fast-paced world, where schedules are often packed and stress levels run high, couples need to carve out time to unwind and reconnect.
Spa treatments offer the perfect opportunity for couples to escape the hustle and bustle of daily life and indulge in much-needed relaxation together.
Also read: Active honeymoons: Outdoor adventures for nature-loving couples
Whether it’s a serene massage, a rejuvenating facial, or a tranquil soak in a hot tub, these spa experiences provide a peaceful retreat where couples can leave their worries behind and focus on nurturing their bond.
Ginkgo Spa at the Houw Hoek Hotel Experience the perfect blend of modern comfort and historic romance at Houw Hoek Hotel in Grabouw. Located just 80km from Cape Town, this charming inn, South Africa’s oldest licensed hotel, invites guests to relax amid the scenic Kogelberg mountain range.
Cape {town} Etc discount: Get this exclusive deal for a one-night stay for two with a 50-minute couple’s massage for just R1 995 (valued at R3 999). Breakfast included. Get the deal here .

Dive into a world of hand treatments, from luxurious manicures to stunning nail art, all within our tranquil poolside oasis.
Cape {town} Etc discount: Relax together with a couple’s massage for R449 (valued at R990). Get the deal here .

Reflections Day Spa After a stressful few weeks, a trip to the spa is a fantastic way to unwind and clear your mind. Reflections Day Spa is open every day of the week until late. This small spa offers various services, including massages, waxing, and facial and body scrubs.
Cape {town} Etc discount: Get a luxury full-body massage, an Indian head massage, and a light facial for two for R799 (valued at R1 700). Get the deal here .
Details: Location: 0A Glynn Street Unit 27 Roeland Square, Roeland Street City Centre, Gardens Contact: 072 923 0897 | reflectionsdayspa9@gmail.com Website: Facebook Picture: Reflections Day Spa / Facebook Ubuntu Wellness Discover the ultimate relaxation at Ubuntu Wellness in the Mount Nelson Hotel in Gardens. Their specially curated couple’s wellness package is designed to foster closeness and relaxation and to indulge in pampering spa treatments.
Cape {town} Etc discount: Enjoy a three-hour couple’s wellness package for two for R2 480 (valued at R4 400). Includes Goodleaf CBD, crystal foot massages, hydrotherapy, full-body Swedish massage and more. Get the deal here .
Details: Location: Cape Town Medi-Spa, 99 Kloof Street, Gardens Contact: 021 422 5140 | support@ubuntuwellness.com Website: ubuntuwellness.com Picture: Ubuntu Wellness / Facebook La Vita Spa La Vita Spas provides Wellness Spas at Luxury Resorts and Hotels across South Africa, offering a range of spa getaways and beauty treatments. Whether you want to de-stress, revitalise, or restore, their retreats cater to you.
La Vita Spa focuses on delighting the senses with great music, art, aromas, and signature body massages.
